mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ingredientList (num, recipeNum , ingredientCode) VALUES (ingredientList_seq.NEXTVAL, #{recipeNum}, #{ingredientCode})
mapper.select: SELECT ingredientCode, ingredientName, NVL(parent, 0) parent, ingredimageName FROM ingredient ORDER BY ingredientCode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe (recipeNum, caseNum, countryNum, recipeSubject, recipeHitcount, TO_CHAR(recipeReg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') recipeReg_date, recipeServing, recipeLevel, recipeContent, recipeTime,userId, active) VALUES (#{recipeNum}, #{caseNum}, #{countryNum}, #{recipeSubject}, 0, SYSDATE, #{recipeServing}, #{recipeLevel}, #{recipeContent}, #{recipeTime}, #{userId}, 0)
INSERT INTO recipePhoto (recipeNum, recipephotoName) VALUES (#{recipeNum}, #{imageFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT r.recipeNum, r.userId, recipeSubject, recipePhotoName, nickName FROM recipe r LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT p.recipeNum, recipePhotoName FROM recipePhoto p ) p ON r.recipeNum = p.recipeNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT m.userId, nickName FROM member m ) m ON r.userId = m.userId ) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= 100 ) WHERE rnum >= 1 ORDER BY rnum ASC
